itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest defensive superstar Demarcus Lawrence of the Dallas Cowboys as we discuss his career, why he grew up a Cowboys fan, what it's like signing a $100 million contract, his thoughts on the Antonio Brown saga, and why the Cowboys will win the Super Bowl. Afterward, we give our college football and NFL picks of the week including the spreads, and fantasy football waiver wire pickups. Bet with us or against us at Mybookie.com and use the promo code DRINKINBROS to double your deposit.
